83.plot: You know Dylan Neal as a talented actor currently cast in Cedar Cove TV, did you also know he's a talented woodworker too? He tells us all about it coming up on Wednesday's show! Then Cristina and Dylan make Char-grilled Steak with Green Olive, Caper and Basil Salsa! Speaking of talent, get ready to be wowed by The Texas Tenors! They tell us about getting their start on America's Got Talent and perform, "You Should Dream"! Samantha Cassetty, the Nutrition Director for Good Housekeeping, has 6 different ways oatmeal can help you feel and look younger!

228.plot: Cameron Mathison co-hosts alongside Debbie; actors Steve Bacic and Kevin O'Grady, from the movie Garage Sale Mystery: The Mask Murder (2018); chef Stephanie Izard cooks soft-shell crabs in chile sauce; John Kanell ("Preppy Kitchen" creator) bakes a shag rug cake; bestselling author Mark Gregston (book, "Raising Teens in a Contrary Culture"); Paige Hemmis makes a DIY outdoor movie night; Larissa Wohl discusses making home design with pets in mind; Maria Provenzano makes DIY flower pots three ways; Lawrence Zarian presents fashions for an ocean cruise; Orly Shani makes DIY quilted placemats;

229.title: Guest Co-Host Cameron Mathison/Barbara Niven/Fabio Viviani
229.plot: Guest co-host/Hallmark star Cameron Mathison ("A Summer to Remember") presents summer camping essentials; actress Barbara Niven talks about the Hallmark Channel original series, "Chesapeake Shores"; chef Fabio Viviani cooks a pistachio and pine-nut encrusted pan-roasted trout; Maria Provenzano bakes a bonfire cake; Lawrence Zarian presents pearl fashions; Orly Shani makes a DIY ice cream towel poncho; Paige Hemmis creates postage stamp décor; Shirley Bovshow discusses an August garden to-do list; Nicole Meyer ("Nibbles by Nic") makes frittata muffins;

230.title: Guest Co-Host Cameron Mathison/Autumn Reeser/Karen Waldrup
230.plot: Guest co-host/Hallmark star Cameron Mathison ("A Summer to Remember"); actress Autumn Reeser talks about the Hallmark Channel original movie, "Season for Love"; country musician Karen Waldrup performs; chef Marisa Churchill bakes a key lime pie; Maria Provenzano makes DIY sunglass faces; Paige Hemmis makes a DIY condiment picnic table; psychotherapist Amy Morin (book, "13 Things Mentally Strong Parents Don't Do") discusses raising mentally strong kids; nutritionist J.J. Virgin (book, "The Virgin Diet") makes paleo egg roll bowls; Orly Shani makes a DIY back to school time clock;
